description:
Proof of acceptance into a registered Australian education provider.
- **Ward Verification Documents Required:**
  - Address verification certificate from local ward office
  - Name verification certificate
  - Income source verification
  - Birth certificate with ward office attestation
  - Family registration certificate
  - Property ownership verification (if applicable)
how_to_obtain: From your chosen Australian institution after receiving an offer of admission.
common_mistakes: Not ensuring CoE matches intended course and duration

title: Australian Embassy in Nepal: Key Information for Students
content: The Australian Embassy in Nepal, established in 1984, facilitates relations between the two countries. Approximately 180,000 Nepalis reside in Australia. [1]

citations.quote: Around 180,000 Nepalis have made Australia their home and they are contributing to our countriesâ€™ close relations, including through growing business connections.
